item.title: ... baking bread
item.description:
Recipe 1:

  • 1000 g flour (wheat or spelt)

  • 60% - 65% water (60% with spelt)

  • 2% salt

  • yeast

Knead, proof over night, pre-heat oven (incl. baking stone) and a cast iron pot with lid (Dutch oven) to 265 C or the maximum temperature of you oven.

Form the loaf and proof (on a sheet of baking parchment) until well risen.

Move loaf with the parchment into the pre-heated pot, return to the oven, turn down the oven to 250 C and bake for 1 hour.

item.title: ... with every success a damper
item.description:
Whatever tech god smiled on me while setting up hubpress, was much too busy to lent some support during the setup of our new dvb-t2 receiver. That decided that using the EPG once should be a lifetime achievement.

Upate 2017-02-12: Found out why …​ the manual described it wrong.

item.title: ... bring us to your leader
item.description: Here we go again …​ more later

item.title: a sense of accomplishment
item.description: I’ve now managed to get http://hubpress.io up and running. Now to work out how to do this from a Tablett.
